meanings.definition: An infectious disease caused by the Epstein-Barr virus, characterized by fever, sore throat, and swollen lymph nodes.
meanings.sent1: After catching mononucleoses, Sarah had to rest a lot and drink plenty of fluids.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed John with mononucleoses after he complained of a persistent sore throat.
meanings.sent3: Mononucleoses decided to visit the whole school, causing chaos in the classrooms.
meanings.sent4: The spread of mononucleoses in the community was like a silent wave, affecting many unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The symptoms of mononucleoses made Sarah feel like she was carrying a heavy burden.
